1239年建立的因斯布鲁克是奥地利蒂罗尔州的首府，坐落阿尔卑斯山谷之中，意为“茵河”上的桥。小城保持着中世纪城市的容貌，狭窄小街上哥特风格的楼房鳞次栉比，展现出古城的风貌。著名的滑雪胜地，1964年和1976年两次举办冬季奥林匹克运动会。 小丸表示夏天在茵河边远眺雪山吃冰淇淋超惬意的！

要是用翻译的方法学的话就像跑虚拟机(VM)一样， 处理速度(思维)和输出(表达)之间总存在损耗(overhead)。 不如试试用原生态学法， 从思维方式开始改变。 一开始会辛苦点， 但小成之后就不用损失"带宽"了。 不过最后两套思维就像两套不同的"算法"， 挑一套适合自己的才好。

金钱肚捞面。牛是反刍动物，有四个胃，分别是瘤胃、网胃（蜂巢胃或金钱肚)、瓣胃（百叶胃，俗称牛百叶）和皱胃。前3个胃里面没有胃腺，不分泌胃液，称为前胃。第四个胃有胃腺，能分泌消化液，与猪和人的胃类似。 卤得合格的金钱肚爽滑弹牙但入滋入味。搞不好的成了一堆软趴趴的暧昧东西。

春晚首次碰头会结束后，公布了语言类节目创作四字方针：真 亲 小 乐。所谓"真"指真诚，以真诚的态度创作，"亲"指亲切、亲民，"小"即以小见大，用小故事讴歌大时代，"乐"指欢乐，因为欢乐永远是语言节目的根本。喜大普奔啊...

三黎鱼三兄弟。也叫鲥鱼。广东有句话：“春鳊,秋鲤,夏三黎”。三黎鱼肉细嫩，脂肪厚，脂肪中有一层不饱和脂肪酸，在蒸熟的时候有一种独特的香味。鱼味鲜肉细，营养价值极高，它富含不饱和脂肪酸，具有降低胆固醇的作用，对防止血管硬化、高血压和冠心病等大有益处。

My mother, who is not from Xiangxi, formed a rather negative impression of the people from Xiangxi due to a few cases of "broken promises" by my father's Xiangxi fellow villagers. One day, a friend of my father came to Changsha on a business trip and called to make a dinner reservation. As a result, my mother busied herself the whole day, but the guest did not show up even until midnight. A few years later, when they met again, my mother brought up this incident. The gentleman politely replied, "Sister-in-law, I was afraid of causing you trouble!"

这段文字可以这样改写：看到这一点，会让人联想到数学中的3加4。 在此基础上深思熟虑后，做出自己的决策时最好不要采取激进的方法。 与其一次性决定，不如像播种一样，让事情逐步发展；定期审视整体计划，用同一标准评估；然后保留表现优秀的继续发展，淘汰表现次的，继续引入新的元素；如此循环往复。在去机场的路上讨论到的这种思路，现在在理论上得到了更深入的探讨。

①The beginning of spring in both 2014 and 2015 fell within the Year of the Horse in the Chinese lunar calendar. ②Some magical Fridays: April 4, 2014 - Friday; June 6, 2014 - Friday; August 8, 2014 - Friday; October 10, 2014 - Friday; December 12, 2014 - Friday. ③Chinese Lantern Festival and Western Valentine's Day coincided on the same day. ④The Year of the Horse was quite unique, lasting 384 days with an "intercalary ninth month," allowing those born in the ninth month of the lunar calendar to celebrate their birthdays twice. The Year of the Horse was truly special.

During the Ming Dynasty, Emperor Jiajing was a devout follower of Taoism. Under his rule, the political situation was unstable and society was in turmoil. Emperor Jiajing placed his hopes of consolidating power in the divine, leading to a major renovation of the Wudang Mountains. The "Zhi Shi Xuan Yue" stone archway was built during this period. It is evident that the royal family regarded the Xuan Tian Shang Di as the auspicious deity for governing the world, elevating Wudang Mountain to the position of the foremost among the Five Sacred Mountains. The enchanting Wudang welcomes your visit!
我早就听说凯里的酸汤鱼很有名。抵达凯里后，首先尝一尝他们的酸汤粉。酸汤是贵州的一种特色美食，不仅有酸汤鱼，还有酸汤排骨、酸汤猪蹄和酸辣烫锅等美味。在贵州有一句流传已久的民谚：“三天不吃酸，走路打窜窜”。回到厦门后又开始怀念那美味的酸汤，该怎么办呢？

夏威夷群岛中有一处被称为Papakōlea的绿沙滩，其独特的绿色来自于沙子中含有的绿色橄榄石。这些橄榄石是由海底火山活动形成后被海浪冲刷至岸边，经过长时间海水的侵蚀，最终变成了沙粒。这便构成了这片被称作“神话沙滩”的沙滩，展现出一种令人赞叹的美丽！

Recently, the "Awaiting Creation - Panhua·New Stars Young Artists Shanghai Exhibition" opened on the 2nd floor of the Wanda Reign Hotel in Yu Garden, Shanghai. This event is an annual important exhibition co-organized by the Panhua Art Center in Shanghai, the Shanghai Zhangjiang Contemporary Art Museum, and the New Stars Art Festival. The "New Stars Art Festival" aims to showcase a glimpse of the true face of the art ecosystem in today's commercial society through the passionate explorations of young independent artists.

To roast a turkey, first step is to soak it in a saltwater solution for 12 hours. Then, brush it with butter, avoiding synthetic ones. Next, tuck two lemon slices under the thighs. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees Fahrenheit, then roast at a constant temperature of 375 degrees. Every 40 minutes or so, baste the turkey with its own juices. Once done, let it rest before carving. Remember, it takes about 13 minutes per pound to roast. Not bad skills, right?

Today is the Beginning of Winter, and in ancient times, it was a common practice among the people to mark the start of winter with this day. The arrival of Beginning of Winter signifies the official beginning of winter for the year. With plants withering and insects hibernating, all things tend to slow down. Although humans do not hibernate, there is a traditional custom of replenishing and nourishing the body with the arrival of Beginning of Winter to better adapt to the changing climate and enhance physical fitness to withstand the imminent cold winter. It's time to start gaining weight and don't forget to eat dumplings! Hello, winter!

Established in 1239, Innsbruck is the capital of the Austrian state of Tyrol, situated in a valley in the Alps, meaning "bridge over the Inn River." The small city maintains the appearance of a medieval town, with Gothic-style buildings lining the narrow streets, showcasing the charm of an ancient city. A renowned ski resort, it hosted the Winter Olympic Games in 1964 and 1976. Wambo remarked that it is delightful to enjoy ice cream while gazing at the snow-capped mountains by the Inn River in the summer.

钱肚捞面。牛是一种反刍动物，它们拥有四个胃，包括瘤胃、网胃（也称为蜂巢胃或金钱肚）、瓣胃（俗称牛百叶）和皱胃。前三个胃不含胃腺，不产生胃液，被称为前胃。第四个胃含有胃腺，可以分泌消化液，类似于猪和人的胃。 优质金钱肚炖煮后口感顺滑弹牙，美味可口。但处理不当的话，可能会变成一团软绵绵、不入味的东西。

My absent-mindedness level has gone up! Tonight, I kept swiping my parking card at the entrance repeatedly, listening to the prompt saying: "This card is not authorized." I stubbornly thought it might have accidentally demagnetized. The owner of the car behind couldn't stand it, got out of the car, and ran over to me, saying, "Don't worry, let me help you swipe it." With the help of the kind-hearted driver, I smoothly entered the parking garage and parked my car. Suddenly, I realized that I... had entered the wrong entrance of the garage; indeed my card was not authorized here.

Various bad news, fast-growing chickens, plasticizers... I said to Yangyang, "What should we eat? Let's eat grass!" He replied, "It's been sprayed with pesticides!" I said again, "Then shall we just drink the northwest wind?" Yangyang responded, "It's polluted!" I widened my eyes and said, "It's really the end of the world!" Do kids in your class discuss topics about the end of the world? Yangyang calmly replied, "No." When I asked why, he said, "Because we are forced by the teacher to think it's the end of the world every day!" It made me laugh until my stomach hurt!

If you feel like taking a stroll, Coconut Island near the hotel is a great choice~ Located at the southern end of Tengqiao, Coconut Island is the estuary of the two rivers in Tengqiao, with a unique water system ecology. It consists of 17 islands with a total area of 4,978 acres. The island is covered with tens of thousands of coconut trees and various fern plants, forming a beautiful picture of the archipelago with blue sky, oasis, azure waters, and silver beaches. Wish you all a pleasant weekend~

在她年幼的时候，俏厨娘经常被邻居家的长辈们邀请去享用丰盛的大餐，尤其是在节假日。每逢这个时候，整个楼道都飘散着美味的香气。邻居们的兄弟姐妹们会回家团聚，我们也会互相串门偷吃，这些真是美好的回忆。一想起这些，心中就涌现出一股温暖的感觉！哎呀，我又闻到外婆红烧肉的香味了。（图片来源：网络）

Spring in Chengdu is known as a world of flowers. Chengdu locals are leisurely and enjoy admiring flowers. Xinjin, located about thirty kilometers from Chengdu, can be easily reached by taking the exit at Dengshuang on the Chengya Expressway, where you will soon see signs guiding the way. In every March, the pear blossoms here bloom, each one delicate and beautiful. Enjoy the vibrant display of various flowers, explore the ancient crossings of Xinjin, and experience the most romantic moments in Xinjin.

榴莲和山竹之所以被誉为果王果后，是因为它们可以相互搭配，一热一寒。但我认为这种食用方式可能有些过度，最好根据季节和个人健康状况适量调节食量。像所有寒性食物一样，孕妇和消化系统脆弱的人最好不要食用山竹；此外，马来妇女通常知道榴莲富含营养，适合孕期食用，但最适合的时间是孕中期，即4-6月。

Heavy rain has hit Beijing, causing all vegetation in the city to be drenched. It is important not to panic at this time. Several years ago, when I was working in Hainan, I would often encounter typhoons a few times a year. During one such stormy night, I was living on the second floor of a villa. After a night of wind and rain, the river water had risen to the corridor on the second floor. There was no electricity, no internet, and no cellphone signal. Around noon, my colleagues paddled a small boat to bring me bread and water. At night, we lit candles and enjoyed the water view outside the window.
在长崎，一种名为“ちりんちりんアイス”的特色冰淇淋以玫瑰花的形态制作，充满创意。这款冰淇淋是由一位高龄的老婆婆制作的，成为长崎的特色之一。每到夏季，老婆婆都会推着小推车来卖冰淇淋，每个小小的冰淇淋都让许多游客感动不已。令人怀念的味道和精美的花样使这款冰淇淋成为一件真正的艺术品。

Today is the eighth day of the lunar twelfth month, and in most regions, there is a custom of eating Laba porridge. Laba porridge is made by mixing eight kinds of ingredients together with rice, symbolizing the gathering of all things and the harmony of spirits. There is a saying that "once Laba is over, it's almost the New Year," so we are getting closer to the New Year! Only 22 days left until New Year's Eve! The editor reminds everyone to remember to have Laba porridge today.

在不知不觉中，我已经二十多岁了。有一天吃面时，我突然感到非常沮丧，意识到自己有太多梦想却时间太少。但没关系，这并不是什么大不了的事情，生活的真谛在于体验过程。闭上眼睛回想，虽然我的29年人生并不完美，但我对生活的热爱却更加强烈了。虽然我又长了一岁，但亲爱的朋友们，你们不也和我一起变老了一岁吗？哈哈。

At 17:00 on the 18th, the meteorological information for Beijing indicates that the city will be shrouded in fog tonight, with the lowest temperature of 18°C. There will be showers from the latter half of the night until tomorrow morning, with light rainfall. It will become mostly cloudy in the afternoon, and the highest temperature will reach 26°C. Tomorrow is the traditional Chinese festival, Mid-Autumn Festival. The rain and fog may adversely affect traffic in the morning, so please pay attention to travel safety. It is expected to be mostly clear tomorrow night, suitable for people to enjoy the moon outdoors.

After devouring 18 pieces of Wan Chai Ferry dumplings filled with chives and shrimp, and 5 sticks of Katohya garlic and black pepper sausages, I took a big sip of the chilling iCing Love Grapefruit Rice Wine from Kuchun Tang. The taste of grapefruit's sourness mixed with the bitterness of alcohol hit my palate. I couldn't distinguish whether the sweetness came from natural ingredients or additives, but the overall balance was irresistible! Despite its 4% alcohol content, the drink was surprisingly strong. With a belly full of dumplings and sausages, I found myself pleasantly tipsy – could it be related to love?

After returning to Poland from Sri Lanka, the in-laws went from the tropical sunshine of the South to the icy winter of Europe. Coupled with jet lag, both of them fell ill. Yesterday, the father-in-law had a meeting at 8:30 a.m. but ended up waking up at 8:45 a.m.! They have already begun preparations for the Christmas feast these days. As they will be celebrating the holiday in the Netherlands this year, they need to get ready well in advance. They plan to resist a few carp to celebrate Christmas in the village.

在春晚首次碰头会之后，宣布了语言类节目创作的四字方针：真、亲、小、乐。所谓的“真”是指真诚，要以真诚的态度进行创作；“亲”代表亲切和亲民；“小”意味着从小事物中见大道理，用小故事来歌颂大时代；“乐”表示欢乐，因为欢乐始终是语言节目的核心。可以说，大家对此都欣喜若狂啊...

第一次躺在床上准备入睡时突然起床发微博，嘉蔚向我讲述了一件关于特哥的小故事，我被感动得几乎要流泪了。总结一句话，遇见了对的人，真的是多么美好，真的是非常美好。我们愿意与你这个对的人相伴一生，无论生死相随，无论贫富患难。在这个夸张的社会里，仍然拥有这样的爱情，我为我们感到自豪！晚安，龙哥，特哥。
生日快乐！今天是我侄女十岁生日啦~自从她出生以来，我就对她关爱有加，不仅在情感上呵护她，还时常给她买衣服、零食和小礼物。甚至曾经购买过电子琴来培养她的兴趣爱好。尽管她调皮捣蛋时我不时会斥责她，但我内心对她的爱会随着她的成长而不断加深。希望她能努力学习，不辜负全家对她的期望。希望我的侄女也能快快长大哦。

今年，奥林匹克公园的标志性建筑，即观光塔，将在朝阳区“两会”上宣布即将对游客开放。据悉，这座高达246.8米的观光塔包括一座主塔和四座副塔，俯瞰时犹如一座巨大的五环，矗立在北京北中轴线附近。乘坐电梯可直达塔顶，游客可饱览整个奥林匹克公园的景色，同时还可一览鼓楼、故宫、香山等北京著名景点的壮丽景色。

Before the bed, the bright moonlight shines, craving for some traditional earthen pot soup. People are thinner than yellow flowers because they lack the Ganxi land mushrooms. Just as the small lotus leaves reveal their tips, red rice pairs perfectly with pumpkin soup. As the moon sets, crows cry under the frosty sky, the unbeatably fresh cuisine of Jiangxi. The spring breeze turns the southern bank green, stone-ground chicken feet are not afraid of being burned. When will you return? No one knows, take a bite of chicken feet and smile. I advise the gods to be vigorous, there must be Guiyu fish stewed with noodles. I wish to be a loving bird in the sky, enjoying Nanchang fried noodles!

I never feel at ease watching movies in Sanlitun. It seems like an old cucumber painted green, always venturing into the territory of post-90s and post-80s to invite humiliation upon oneself. Yet, in just a short walk from McDonald's to the restroom, I encountered three waves of acquaintances. One wave was of those alongside me, probably in their 60s, another wave by my side, almost 70, and the last wave, surely in their 90s, a pair of interns from the company. Feeling slightly annoyed by 2/3 of the encounters, I might consider visiting Sanlitun again in the future.

There is a clever little mouse that steals rice on my window sill. At first, there was one that would occasionally come to my window sill, but it would fly away as soon as I looked up. So, I started sprinkling some rice on the window sill every day, and gradually it started coming every day. Slowly, more and more mice would come, two or three at a time, obediently serving as my models, without running away at the slightest glance from me. Please forgive the dirty windows, it's not easy for everyone on rainy days.

There are various ways to cook a small pigeon. Today, let's try three of them. Braised pigeon: sweet and savory, excellent taste. Ginger pigeon: less sweet than braised pigeon, but with the fragrant aroma of ginger, and the skin is crispy while the meat is tender. Pigeon rice cooked in an electric rice cooker: the rice is flavorful, with a slightly sticky texture reminiscent of glutinous rice, but the pigeon meat in the rice lacks flavor. It seems there's no need to specifically go to Zhongshan for pigeon anymore!

Three Lip fish, also known as Chinese herring, are three brothers in the fish family. In Guangdong, there is a saying: "Spring fish, autumn carp, summer Three Lip fish". The meat of Three Lip fish is tender and fatty, with a layer of unsaturated fatty acids in the fat, giving it a unique aroma when steamed. The fish has a fresh taste and high nutritional value, as it is rich in unsaturated fatty acids, which can help lower cholesterol levels and provide many benefits such as preventing arteriosclerosis, hypertension, and coronary heart disease.

Taiwanese ramen，作为名古屋的代表，闻名于日本全国。台湾拉面起源于30年前，由台湾厨师郭明优先生以台湾担仔面为原型，参考了名古屋喜欢重口味的特点，创造了这碗口味浓厚、辣而不腻的台湾拉面。郭先生的饭店因此而闻名，就是名古屋人都知道的――「味仙」。

生活小窍门时间到！看这里！1. 如果鞋子磨脚，可以在磨处涂上少许白酒，就不会再磨脚了。2. 牙齿变黄时，可以嚼碎花生，含在嘴里用来刷牙3分钟，效果很好。3. 眼睛进了小灰尘，闭上眼睛用力咳嗽几次，灰尘就会排出。4. 打嗝时喝点醋可以止住。5. 吃了有异味的食物，如大蒜或臭豆腐，吃几颗花生米就能解决。

A few days ago, the pig trotters from the barbecue stall were too good to resist. After waiting in line for half a day and taking only a few bites, I realized that making them at home would truly satisfy my cravings. After stewing and marinating them, I popped them into the oven (though secretly I thought deep-frying would be even better). Once they were ready, I served them on a dry plate for dipping. Both of us agreed that this meal was incredibly delicious, especially for this person who usually doesn't like pig trotters, yet couldn't stop eating them...
北大光华EMBA校友会又迎来新成员，福建校友会于4月6日正式成立。在成立典礼上，光华学院院长蔡洪滨教授、副院长兼EMBA中心主任张志学教授，以及院长助理兼EMBA中心执行主任江明华教授授予校友会主席和秘书长聘书。期待福建校友会的建立将为北大和闽商校友提供更便捷的交流平台。

At the age of thirteen, I was admitted to Beijing No. 2 Girls' High School and studied there for six years. Fifty years have passed, but we still often have class reunions. Today, the daughter-in-law of an old classmate who I treated is pregnant. We embraced each other excitedly. We called our old classmate who lives nearby, and she hurried over to congratulate us. As we sat together, we reminisced about the fun times we had in high school... We will meet again when we become grandmothers.

可可看到我手上戴着的戒指，问道：“妈妈，这是哪儿来的？”我回答说：“是爸爸送给我的。”可可接着问：“为什么爸爸送给你呢？”我告诉她：“因为前天是我们结婚纪念日，所以爸爸送给了我。”可可表示：“我也要爸爸送。”我告诉她：“等你结婚了，爸爸也会送给你的。”可可回答说：“爸爸才不会送我呢！是我的老公会送我戒指。”我笑着说：“孩子，你知道的也太多了吧。”

早上，我的同事在房间里听歌，播放了一首《千里之外》，歌词中有一句是“一生有李白”。这让我思考，什么情况下才能拥有“一生有李白”呢？我分析后得出，必须同时满足以下条件：1. 与李白同住或紧邻；2. 年龄比李白小或与李白同岁；3. 比李白早逝或与李白同时去世。只有满足这三个条件的人才能拥有“一生有李白”。

During the summer solstice, the daylight is the longest and the yang energy is at its peak. Take advantage of this yang energy by consuming hot soups and broths like chicken soup noodles for those with cold hands and feet in winter. For those who are afraid of heat and dryness, consider having Rehmannia glutinosa porridge or tremella lotus seed soup. If experiencing menstrual pain due to a cold constitution, try boiling eggs with mugwort leaves, 15 grams of dried ginger, and 2 eggs over low heat until cooked. Peel the eggs, add 10 grams of mugwort leaves, simmer for 10 minutes, and finally add brown sugar to warm and invigorate the blood vessels. In conclusion, everyone should go to bed early today and avoid overexertion.

The 2013 Fujian Nanping (Beijing) Cultural Industry Investment Promotion Conference was successfully held at the Fujian Building. I attended the event as a representative of the Beijing-Xiamen Chamber of Commerce and delivered a speech. Nanping is located in the northern part of Fujian Province, known as "Northern Fujian," bordering Zhejiang and Jiangxi provinces. It consists of one district, four cities, and five counties, with a population of 3.06 million. The region boasts a rich cultural heritage and unique tourism culture, including famous teas like Wuyi Rock Tea Dahongpao and Zhengshan Xiaozhong.
